title: Score
description: After our parents died, I left the army to raise my four siblings and rebuild our lives. I’m not going to let some blue-haired hockey player tear it apart.♥♥♥♥♥Former Marine Connor Casey’s life revolves around his siblings. After Hurricane Harvey destroys their home, the state threatens to put them in foster care if he doesn't get the house fixed ASAP. The only problem is working full-time and raising four kids doesn't give him a lot of time for home repairs, and money is tight.Beau Hopper is good at goodbyes. A minor-league hockey player, he goes where the league tells him. Single and estranged from his family, Beau drifts without connections or commitments. Living in his newest team's frat house is driving him insane. So when he learns about the sexy auto mechanic's dilemma, he volunteers to help in exchange for a place to stay.It doesn't take long for the two lonely men to give in to the heat between them.  But it takes more than passion and plywood to build a home, and when the big leagues come calling after Beau, Connor can’t ask him to stay... but how can he ever let him go?This book contains eye-rolling teenagers, stolen kisses, and fewer noogies than you’d expect.Welcome to Hidden Creek, Texas, where the heart knows what it wants, and where true love lives happily ever after. Every Men of Hidden Creek novel can be read on its own, but keep an eye out for familiar faces around town!
author: A.E. Wasp
